page.title: 14BIOGRAPHY
page.content: SATURDAY. BY JACK WETHERALL. AGED 10 Normally on a Saturday I wake up and read a book till about 9.00am. Then I get out of bed and go down-stairs to watch television in my pyjamas. Normally on Saturday morning I like to watch "The Greatest American Hero". It is a television programme about a school teacher who is made into a super hero against his will. At lunch I have chips with something and then walk to the library. Our library is in the centre of town and it is here I return my books, then go into the junior library. I first look on the paper-back stand for a mystery or a 'Doctor Who' story. Then I go and reserve a book. My overall favourites are the adventure books by Willard Price. I collect about six books and return home, stopping to buy my weekly sweets - large quantities!
